ai-pv1:1.1_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-pv1:2.3_0: the seeds are contrary to the Teaching,
ai-pv1:3.1_0: this is the seed, a field.
ai-pv1:3.2_0: don’t give gifts to the departed,
ai-pv1:4.2_0: When those who have passed away, they be reborn.
ai-pv1:4.3_0: They pass on to a place in heaven,
ai-pv1:5.1_0: The first site for a field with good field.
